mapper.select: SELECT study_title as title , DATE_FORMAT(study_period_start,'%Y-%m-%d') as start , DATE_FORMAT(study_period_end,'%Y-%m-%d') as end FROM tb_study ORDER BY study_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_study (study_title, study_period_start, study_period_end) VALUE (#{title}, #{start}, #{end})
